pageContext.claim: “[Biden] also said he's running for the US Senate two or three times.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referencing a video circulating online that is missing context. Biden is describing the arc of his political career and goes on to say: "When I ran as a proud Democrat for vice president and running as a proud Democrat for president. I promise you this, I will govern as an American president. I will govern for everyone who voted for me as well as against me.”
